org.openhubframework.openhub.core.reqres

Class RequestSendingEventNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.camel.support.ServiceSupport
      • org.apache.camel.support.EventNotifierSupport
        • org.openhubframework.openhub.api.event.EventNotifierBase<org.apache.camel.management.event.ExchangeSendingEvent>
          • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.reqres.RequestSendingEventNotifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.camel.CamelContextAware, org.apache.camel.Service, org.apache.camel.ShutdownableService, org.apache.camel.spi.EventNotifier, org.apache.camel.StatefulService, org.apache.camel.SuspendableService

    @EventNotifier
public class RequestSendingEventNotifier
extends EventNotifierBase<org.apache.camel.management.event.ExchangeSendingEvent>
    Listens to request sending (event = ExchangeSendingEvent). If endpoint URI is successfully filtered and saving is enabled then request is saved to DB.
    Since:
    0.4
    Author:
    Petr Juza
    See Also:
    ResponseReceiveEventNotifier
